      • checkAppExist

        public boolean checkAppExist(java.lang.String packageName)
        check app exist
        返回:
        true-exist,false-no exist;

      • cleanMemory

        kill background app

      • getAppInfos

        public java.lang.String getAppInfos(int index,
                                    int count)
        get app list
        参数:
        index - start position
        count - app count
        返回:
        json data of JAppInfo array

      • getAppInfos2

        public java.util.ArrayList<JAppInfo> getAppInfos2(int index,
                                                  int count)
        get app list
        参数:
        index - start position
        count - app count
        返回:
        JAppInfo array

      • getAppName

        public java.lang.String getAppName(java.lang.String pkg,
                                   java.lang.String clazz)
        参数:
        pkg - package name
        clazz - activity class name
        返回:
        app name

      • getFirstLauncherActivity

        public java.lang.String getFirstLauncherActivity(java.lang.String pkg)
        Get first launcher activity(CATEGORY_LAUNCHER)
        参数:
        pkg - package name
        返回:
        class name

      • getIcon

        public byte[] getIcon(java.lang.String pkg,
                      java.lang.String clazz)
        get app icon data with bin
        参数:
        pkg - package name
        clazz - activity class name
        返回:
        app icon data with bin

        根据报名获取应用，一个应用可能有多个launcher属性（多个图标显示）

        参数:

      • isSystemApp

        public boolean isSystemApp(java.lang.String packageName)
        check system app
        返回:
        true-system app,false-normal app;

      • killProcess

        public void killProcess(java.lang.String pkg)
        杀死指定报名的应用
        参数:
        pkg - 需要杀死的包名

      • openBrowser

        public void openBrowser(java.lang.String url)
        start browser
        参数:
        url - HTTP/HTTPS must be included

      • openBrowser

        public void openBrowser(java.lang.String packageName,
                        java.lang.String url)
        start browser. If packageName is exist, it will show select dialog.
        参数:
        packageName - for example : com.android.chrome、org.mozilla.vrbrowser
        url - HTTP/HTTPS must be included

      • scanApps

        public void scanApps()
        scan apps

      • setListener

        public void setListener(AppUtils.AppListener listener)
        Callback
        参数:
        listener - listener app count change

      • startApp

        public void startApp(java.lang.String pkg)
        start app with package
        参数:
        pkg - package name

      • startApp

        public void startApp(java.lang.String pkg,
                     java.lang.String clazz)
        start app with package/class
        参数:
        pkg - package name
        clazz - activity class name

      • startApp

        public void startApp(java.lang.String pkg,
                     java.lang.String clazz,
                     java.lang.String key,
                     boolean value)
        start app with package/class
        参数:
        pkg - package name
        clazz - activity class name
        key - param-key
        value - param-value

      • startApp

        public void startApp(java.lang.String pkg,
                     java.lang.String clazz,
                     java.lang.String type,
                     java.lang.String title,
                     java.lang.String uri,
                     java.lang.String info)
        start app with package/class
        参数:
        pkg - package name
        clazz - activity class name
        type - video/* image/*
        title - name of video/image
        uri - video uri(local[/storage/emulated/0/Movies/test.mp4] or net[http://192.168.1.1/test.mp4] address)
        info - json data with JAppInfo
